subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of the Green Revolution?
B_en: Improve the quality of life in rural areas
B_hi: राज्य के लिए उत्तर्याण्ड के लिए विक्रम्पिक अनुसूचित
D_en: Improve the economic condition of the state
E_en: Improve the quality of life in the state
explanation_en: The primary objective of the Green Revolution was to improve the quality of life in the state by increasing agricultural productivity. This resulted in various improvements in rural areas like increased income, better healthcare, education, and infrastructure.
explanation: Green Revolution का मुख राज्य की समृद्धी बेच्चार्ज
